name: Square Edges
description: Mini arcade game about a cube jumping on moving platforms. All platforms move at different speeds. Find the right moment to make a precise jump so as not to fall off the edge. There may be a token on some platforms. Collect tokens and gain a high rating to purchase other characters. The gameplay is complicated by the shape of the platforms and the inability to stand on them for too long. Collect a lot of tokens and good luck in the game.
